headline.main: DoubleLine's Gundlach Says He Likes Bonds More Than a Month Ago
headline.print_headline: DoubleLine's Gundlach Says He Likes Bonds More Than a Month Ago

docs.snippet: Jeffrey Gundlach, chief executive of DoubleLine Capital, said on Wednesday that U.S. Treasury bonds look attractive because  their yields have moved higher in recent weeks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Gundlach, chief executive of DoubleLine Capital, said on Wednesday that U.S. Treasury bonds look attractive because  their yields have moved higher in recent weeks.

headline.main: 7-Hour Standoff With Injured Military Vet Ends Peacefully
headline.print_headline: 7-Hour Standoff With Injured Military Vet Ends Peacefully

docs.snippet: Police say a 7-hour standoff with a retired military man who was holding his family against their will for part of that time has ended peacefully....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a 7-hour standoff with a retired military man who was holding his family against their will for part of that time has ended peacefully.

headline.main: Glencore in Talks on Streaming Deals on Chile, Peru Mines: Sources
headline.print_headline: Glencore in Talks on Streaming Deals on Chile, Peru Mines: Sources

docs.snippet: Glencore is in talks with Franco-Nevada Corp, Silver Wheaton Corp, Royal Gold Inc and two other companies to sell portions of the future production of three South American copper mines, two sources with knowledge of the talks said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glencore is in talks with Franco-Nevada Corp, Silver Wheaton Corp, Royal Gold Inc and two other companies to sell portions of the future production of three South American copper mines, two sources with knowledge of the talks said.

headline.main: An Installation — and a Collaboration — for the Pattern-Obsessed

docs.snippet: The design studio Patternity and the e-invitation company Paperless Post have worked together on a series of cards, as well as an immersive pop-up....
docs.lead_paragraph: The design studio Patternity and the e-invitation company Paperless Post have worked together on a series of cards, as well as an immersive pop-up.

headline.main: Blackhawks' Kane on Camp Roster Amid Police Investigation
headline.print_headline: Blackhawks' Kane on Camp Roster Amid Police Investigation

docs.snippet: Patrick Kane is expected to join his Chicago Blackhawks teammates at training camp this week as he awaits the results of a sexual-assault investigation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane is expected to join his Chicago Blackhawks teammates at training camp this week as he awaits the results of a sexual-assault investigation.

headline.main: Ethics Board: It's Legal for Haley to Get Season Tickets
headline.print_headline: Ethics Board: It's Legal for Haley to Get Season Tickets

docs.snippet: Add getting Gamecocks season football tickets in a luxury suite to the list of permissible perks for South Carolina's governor....
docs.lead_paragraph: Add getting Gamecocks season football tickets in a luxury suite to the list of permissible perks for South Carolina's governor.

headline.main: Archbishop of Canterbury Calls Anglican Leaders to Meeting
headline.print_headline: Archbishop of Canterbury Calls Anglican Leaders to Meeting

docs.snippet: The Archbishop of Canterbury has summoned Anglican leaders from throughout the world for a vital meeting next year as he struggles to keep the global fellowship together despite severe internal splits....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Archbishop of Canterbury has summoned Anglican leaders from throughout the world for a vital meeting next year as he struggles to keep the global fellowship together despite severe internal splits.

headline.main: Las Vegas, Los Angeles-Area Agencies Ink Water-For-Cash Deal
headline.print_headline: Las Vegas, Los Angeles-Area Agencies Ink Water-For-Cash Deal

docs.snippet: Water managers in Los Angeles and Las Vegas are poised to adopt a drought-driven deal to send enough water to serve about 300,000 homes annually from the Lake Mead reservoir to Southern California....
docs.lead_paragraph: Water managers in Los Angeles and Las Vegas are poised to adopt a drought-driven deal to send enough water to serve about 300,000 homes annually from the Lake Mead reservoir to Southern California.

headline.main: U.N. Chief 'Outraged' by Burkina Faso Detentions, Calls for Release
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief 'Outraged' by Burkina Faso Detentions, Calls for Release

docs.snippet: United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon expressed outrage on Wednesday at reports of the detention of Burkina Faso's president and prime minister and several ministers, calling for their immediate release....
docs.lead_paragraph: United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon expressed outrage on Wednesday at reports of the detention of Burkina Faso's president and prime minister and several ministers, calling for their immediate release.

headline.main: O'Hair Trying to Turn Good Recovery Into a Great One
headline.print_headline: O'Hair Trying to Turn Good Recovery Into a Great One

docs.snippet: The best remaining players on the PGA Tour are north of Chicago for the third straight tournament that features an $8.25 million purse and a chance to claim the $10 million bonus for winning the FedEx Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: The best remaining players on the PGA Tour are north of Chicago for the third straight tournament that features an $8.25 million purse and a chance to claim the $10 million bonus for winning the FedEx Cup.
